Class Model

java.lang.Object
Model
public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
The Model holds all information retrieved from the API response. For now, a Request is passed into the model and then a call to the getResponse method sends this request to the API.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Model​(Request userRequest)
    A Request is passed into the model and the model stores data once a response from the API is received.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    com.mashape.unirest.http.HttpResponse<com.mashape.unirest.http.JsonNode> getRawJSON()  
    com.mashape.unirest.http.HttpResponse<com.mashape.unirest.http.JsonNode> getResponse()
    getResponse makes the call to the Yahoo Finance API, using the Request object passed to the constructor.
    void parseResponse()
    parseResponse wrangles the raw JSON data response from getResponse() and extracts the desirable information from within int.
    void printOptions()
    printOptions displays the retrieved information neatly, and in a human-readable way.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Model

      public Model​(Request userRequest) throws java.lang.Exception, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      A Request is passed into the model and the model stores data once a response from the API is received.
      Parameters:
      userRequest - a Request to be sent to the API
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Request object has a bad ticker according to the models internal tickerList
      java.lang.Exception

  • Method Details

    • getResponse

      public com.mashape.unirest.http.HttpResponse<com.mashape.unirest.http.JsonNode> getResponse() throws java.lang.Exception
      getResponse makes the call to the Yahoo Finance API, using the Request object passed to the constructor. The status is reported and if a good response is received, status code 200 is outputted to the console. The raw JSON data is stored in the rawJSON field of this model.
      Returns:
      a httpResponse response object from the API
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if an error is encountered in making a request to the Yahoo Finance API

    • parseResponse

      public void parseResponse()
      parseResponse wrangles the raw JSON data response from getResponse() and extracts the desirable information from within int. New Option objects are created for every contract found within the root JSON object. These are then stored in the callList and putList as according to OptionType.

    • getRawJSON

      public com.mashape.unirest.http.HttpResponse<com.mashape.unirest.http.JsonNode> getRawJSON()

    • printOptions

      public void printOptions()
      printOptions displays the retrieved information neatly, and in a human-readable way.
